name: @tonutils/keyring
description: A secure and convenient Keyring library for Node.js, designed to efficiently manage and store cryptographic keys in a unified and organized manner. This package offers an easy-to-use API for creating, importing, and exporting keys, as well as performing encryption, decryption, signing, and verification operations, facilitating the development of secure and reliable decentralized applications.
author: thekiba <hr@thekiba.io>, goreactdev <goreactdev12@gmail.com>
